option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <FrameLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:padding="8dp">
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/rvConversations" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvEmpty" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:gravity="center" android:text="No conversations" android:visibility="gone"/>
</FrameLayout>
